traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Net
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.
